text: Anthiyur taluk (Tamil: அந்தியூர் வட்டம்) is a taluk of Erode district of the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is made up of four blocks – Anthiyur, Athani, Burgur and Ammapet. ==List of Villages in Anthiyur taluk== # Brammadesam # Burgur ( Hill Station ) # Chinnathambipalayam # Ennamangalam # Gettisamuthiram # Keelwani # Koothampoondi # Kuppandampalayam # Michealpalayam # Moogilpatti # Nagalur # Pachampalayam # Sangarapalayam # Vempathy ==References== Category:Erode district
title: Anthiyur taluk
